name: The Devil's Treaty
description:
A spooky demon has instructed you to sacrifice enough trick or treaters by the end of the night, or else... Complete the ritual by making sacrifices to fill in the pentagram in the sky. Make sure you don't run out of candy though, or kids won't fall for your tricks!
Made by Gyliph and Sem

Trick or Treater Sprites by KingKelpo

Art by Gyliph

Music by Sem

Everything else by both Sem and Gyliph
